verses.verse: These were the divisions<WH4256> of the sons<WH1121> of Aaron.<WH175> The sons<WH1121> of Aaron:<WH175> Nadab<WH5070> and Abihu,<WH30> Eleazar<WH499> and Ithamar.<WH385>
But Nadab<WH5070> and Abihu<WH30> died<WH4191> before<WH6440> their father,<WH1> and had no children:<WH1121> therefore Eleazar<WH499> and Ithamar<WH385> executed the priest<WH3547>'s office.

David<WH1732> with Zadok<WH6659> of the sons<WH1121> of Eleazar,<WH499> and Ahimelech<WH288> of the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar,<WH385> divided<WH2505> them according to their ordering<WH6486> in their service.<WH5656>

There were more<WH7227> chief<WH7218> men<WH1397> found<WH4672> of the sons<WH1121> of Eleazar<WH499> than of the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar;<WH385> and they were divided<WH2505> like this:<WH1121> of the sons of Eleazar<WH499> there were sixteen,<WH8337> heads<WH7218> of fathers<WH1>' houses;<WH1004> and of the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar,<WH385> according to their fathers<WH1>' houses,<WH1004> eight.<WH8083>

Thus were they divided<WH2505> impartially<WH428> by drawing<WH428> lots;<WH1486> for there were princes<WH8269> of the sanctuary,<WH6944> and princes<WH8269> of God,<WH430> both of the sons<WH1121> of Eleazar,<WH499> and of the sons<WH1121> of Ithamar.<WH385>

Shemaiah<WH8098> the son<WH1121> of Nethanel<WH5417> the scribe,<WH5608> who was of the Levites,<WH3881> wrote<WH3789> them in the presence<WH6440> of the king,<WH4428> and the princes,<WH8269> and Zadok<WH6659> the priest,<WH3548> and Ahimelech<WH288> the son<WH1121> of Abiathar,<WH54> and the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>' households of the priests<WH3548> and of the Levites;<WH3881> one<WH259> fathers<WH1>' house<WH1004> being taken<WH270> for Eleazar,<WH499> and one taken<WH270> for Ithamar.<WH385>
Now the first<WH7223> lot<WH1486> came forth<WH3318> to Jehoiarib,<WH3080> the second<WH8145> to Jedaiah,<WH3048>
the third<WH7992> to Harim,<WH2766> the fourth<WH7243> to Seorim,<WH8188>
the fifth<WH2549> to Malchijah,<WH4441> the sixth<WH8345> to Mijamin,<WH4326>
the seventh<WH7637> to Hakkoz,<WH6976> the eighth<WH8066> to Abijah,<WH29>
the ninth<WH8671> to Jeshua,<WH3442> the tenth<WH6224> to Shecaniah,<WH7935>
the eleventh<WH6249> to Eliashib,<WH475> the twelfth<WH8147> to Jakim,<WH3356>
the thirteenth<WH7969> to Huppah,<WH2647> the fourteenth<WH702> to Jeshebeab,<WH3428>
the fifteenth<WH2568> to Bilgah,<WH1083> the sixteenth<WH8337> to Immer,<WH564>
the seventeenth<WH7651> to Hezir,<WH2387> the eighteenth<WH8083> to Happizzez,<WH6483>
the nineteenth<WH8672> to Pethahiah,<WH6611> the twentieth<WH6242> to Jehezkel,<WH3168>
the twenty<WH6242> - first<WH259> to Jachin,<WH3199> the twenty<WH6242> - second<WH8147> to Gamul,<WH1577>
the twenty<WH6242> - third<WH7969> to Delaiah,<WH1806> the twenty<WH6242> - fourth<WH702> to Maaziah.<WH4590>

This was their ordering<WH6486> in their service,<WH5656> to come<WH935> into the house<WH1004> of Yahweh<WH3068> according to the ordinance<WH4941> given to them by Aaron<WH175> their father,<WH1> as Yahweh,<WH3068> the God<WH430> of Israel,<WH3478> had commanded him.<WH6680>
Of the rest<WH3498> of the sons<WH1121> of Levi:<WH3878> of the sons<WH1121> of Amram,<WH6019> Shubael;<WH7619> of the sons<WH1121> of Shubael,<WH7619> Jehdeiah.<WH3165>
Of Rehabiah:<WH7345> of the sons<WH1121> of Rehabiah,<WH7345> Isshiah<WH3449> the chief.<WH7218>
Of the Izharites,<WH3325> Shelomoth;<WH8013> of the sons<WH1121> of Shelomoth,<WH8013> Jahath.<WH3189>
The sons<WH1121> of Hebron:<WH3404> Jeriah, Amariah<WH568> the second,<WH8145> Jahaziel<WH3166> the third,<WH7992> Jekameam<WH3360> the fourth.<WH7243>
The sons<WH1121> of Uzziel,<WH5816> Micah;<WH4318> of the sons<WH1121> of Micah,<WH4318> Shamir.<WH8053>
The brother<WH251> of Micah,<WH4318> Isshiah;<WH3449> of the sons<WH1121> of Isshiah,<WH3449> Zechariah.<WH2148>
The sons<WH1121> of Merari:<WH4847> Mahli<WH4249> and Mushi;<WH4187> the sons<WH1121> of Jaaziah:<WH3269> Beno.<WH1121>
The sons<WH1121> of Merari:<WH4847> of Jaaziah,<WH3269> Beno,<WH1121> and Shoham,<WH7719> and Zaccur,<WH2139> and Ibri.<WH5681>
Of Mahli:<WH4249> Eleazar,<WH499> who had no sons.<WH1121>
Of Kish;<WH7027> the sons<WH1121> of Kish:<WH7027> Jerahmeel.<WH3396>
The sons<WH1121> of Mushi:<WH4187> Mahli,<WH4249> and Eder,<WH5740> and Jerimoth.<WH3406> These were the sons<WH1121> of the Levites<WH3881> after their fathers<WH1>' houses.<WH1004>

These likewise cast<WH5307> lots<WH1486> even as<WH5980> their brothers<WH251> the sons<WH1121> of Aaron<WH175> in the presence<WH6440> of David<WH1732> the king,<WH4428> and Zadok,<WH6659> and Ahimelech,<WH288> and the heads<WH7218> of the fathers<WH1>' households of the priests<WH3548> and of the Levites;<WH3881> the fathers<WH1>' households of the chief<WH7218> even as<WH5980> those of his younger<WH6996> brother.<WH251>
